actions.desc: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Greatclub

actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d10 + 6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.
actions.name: Rock

special_abilities.desc: The giant has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.
special_abilities.name: Stone Camouflage
